about_the_game:
Hints

This is a version for all ages, and I've already taken care of some in-game content that could cause psychological discomfort in players, so please don't worry.
This work, including all works in this series, is a “tragedy”.
This game English use AI translator plus traditional translator, and has been adjusted manually, if you mind, please do not buy.
This game Japanese is traditional machine translation, if it bothers you, please do not buy.
This game uses VOICEVOX for the voices of the characters.
Do not buy if the player has extremely high demands on the voice.
Thank you.

Background

(ps:Since it is ancient Chinese poetry, the author is not able to translate it accurately, so traditional Chinese is directly attached).
The game begins on 1. September 2012 AD, the single opening day of the school year in China.

中華預言第一奇書《推背圖》
“中國而今有聖人，雖非豪傑也周成，四夷重譯稱天子，否極泰來九國春。”
“無王無帝定乾坤，來自田間第一人，好把舊書多讀到，義言一出見英明。”

劉伯溫《燒餅歌》
“不相僧來不相道，頭戴四兩羊絨帽，真佛不在寺院內，他掌彌勒元頭教。”
“未來教主臨下凡，不落宰府共官員，不在皇宮為太子，不在僧門與道院，降在寒門草堂內，燕南趙北把金散。”
“品物鹹亨一樣形，琴瑟和諧成古道，左中興帝右中興，五百年間出聖君，周流天下賢良輔，氣運南方出將臣，聖人能化亂淵源，八面夷人進貢臨。”

Russia's "Boy from Mars" Poleska.
"China is God's chosen country, the future protector of the earth is born in China."
"I can't say who he is, he's doing something very important, and I'm not the only one following him in his reincarnation, but there are many gods who reincarnate. One of them is his protector. If I mention his name and where he is, then his country will drive him out and even crucify him on a new cross, as the people crucified Jesus."

The French prophet Nostradamus of the sixteenth century, The Ages
"An Oriental leaves his homeland--And crosses the Apennines to reach France--He will cross the sky, the sea, and the ice--And awaken the world with his divine staff." ------------------"Song of the Chronicle II"
"He stayed in Europe and waited long without returning. And he will return to Asia. From the great Hermes. He will surpass all the kings of the East." -------------- "Chronicle X, Canto 75"
"A new school of philosophy prevails through:"despise all life and death and money;"Wealth and fame;"The German mountains cannot restrain themselves;"The flock raises its arms and calls for an answer."-------------------- "Jiji III, 266. Singing"

American Prophet Edgar Cayce
"One day China will be the cradle of Christianity and apply it to people's lives. Yes, it is far away for people, but it is only one day in the mind of God, tomorrow China will wake up!"

American Prophets by Jeanne Dixon
"'The children of angelic humanity' are born in the East; the hope for the salvation of mankind lies in the East; the West represents only the end of things, and the United States will be punished by an ancient Roman downfall."
"Somewhere in the East, a baby is being born that will revolutionize the world, perhaps at the beginning of the 21th century. All humanity will be united under the creed of mutual love, which will be the basis for a new Christianity. He will spread the wisdom of God among people and connect all denominations and doctrines. "
"In the 21th century , humanity will begin to feel the great power of this man. In the following decade, the world will gradually enter a new world with a new form and face, eliminating wars and resolving disasters. His power will grow even greater by 2019, and then people on Earth will discover the full meaning of this vision. "

Game functions

Drama AVG...
Modern backgrounds...
First perspective plus inner monologue of the first person...
If death is considered an end, there are many...
Eight main route ends and dozens of branched normal or bad ends...
I guess the best bad ending is getting out...
20+ BGMs, each song brings you a different extreme experience...
The amount of text is 290,000 (in simplified Chinese script), and the number of recorded voices reaches more than 6,000 (if the voice of the main character Mianhao is recorded, several thousand voices should be added)...
The characters are voiced throughout... [Except for the main character, there is no voice because the plot needs it...] All voices were produced by VOICEVOX Software and authorized by the owner.
The author has composed six songs for the game, all sung by the virtual singers of ACE...

Every choice has its meaning...
Each route has a corresponding message...
Discover the story that once took place in this ridiculously bizarre Hanlin school...
For the next battle: Save the World... Be prepared...

"There are no answers, but I will show the way."

Game description

Numerous prophecies, both ancient and modern, point to a Holy Son coming to the East, a Holy Son who will be the new leader of the world.
He led the world into a happy future.
He has a variety of names, "Holy Son, Holy Spirit, Rainbow Warrior, Wise of the East, Violet Star, etc..." and all these names point to the same person, someone who can save the world.

In 2022 he appears and manages to save the world and fulfill his mission, "Nuss Jump" ...
But people forget that...

The story of the Holy Son of the East was forgotten by the world in 2022...
The women who have chosen to make sacrifices are forgotten by the world...
I will not forget them before I tell the story of the Holy Son of the East 2022...
We need to know this story...

Characters appearing


Name: Wan Jie
Nickname: School Boss
CV：VOICEVOX:青山龍星(CV:みみっく=わんだぁぼっくす)

The newly appointed boss of Hanlin School has a special family background and has his own camp in Hanlin School, which aims to overthrow the management of Hanlin School.
But there seems to be something else behind his behavior...


Name: Rongshan
Nickname: Trash can
CV：VOICEVOX:満別花丸

Due to an accident, she was forced to abandon her human dignity and become the "garbage bin" of the Hanlin School.
After meeting another idiot, her world changes...


Name: Chen Xueli
Nickname: Stupid Radio Girl
CV：VOICEVOX:ナースロボ＿タイプＴなど

Search with your own senses for the true Holy Son. Sign a contract with God and realize the desires of their hearts.
In the eyes of others, she is just a stupid and boring girl, a girl who revels in her own delusional world...


Name: Tan Huiwen
Nickname: Future Little Teacher
CV：VOICEVOX:小夜/SAYO

She was accepted as a model student at Hanlin School, but instead of going to the legendary academic class, she chose the ordinary class 10.
To find out the truth, she had to deal with the management of Hanlin School...


Name: Zhou Junli
Nickname: Messenger with a Mission
CV：VOICEVOX:四国めたん

Blood curse, you can't change that...
Revenge on the world has become the only meaning of her existence...


Name: Li Xiaoli
Nickname: Psychologist
CV：VOICEVOX:冥鳴 ひまり

It was no coincidence that she took the job as a psychologist...
It was a secret to which she always knew the answer, but which she could not reveal...


Name: Wu Wanda
Nickname: Xiao Zhengtai
CV：VOICEVOX:白上虎太郎(CV:可愛ユウ)

He and Mianhao have known each other since their time at Hanlin School Junior High School, and they have always played with each other regularly.
When he came to high school, he said, "I am actually a true Holy Son" to get closer to the girl of his dreams...


Name: Xie Cuiru
Nickname: School Idol
CV：VOICEVOX:あいえるたん

"All I've done is get rid of my sins!"
"All I have done is prove that I have no sins!"
"Will you believe me?"
A little joke leads to an irreparable tragedy, and so secrets arise...

Prehistory History

A young man named Mian Hao believes that he is the Holy Son who will save the world. He believes that this is his birthright, but in the eyes of outsiders, he is just a teenager immersed in his own delusional world. During his time at Junior High School, Mianhao meets Wu Wanda, after which the two advance together to Senior High School at Hanlin School.
He can't even imagine what impact life in high school will have on his world of thought...

The scripts, art works, and music works included in the game are all independently created by game developer Cai Chenglong.
Do not use the game content for any commercial or non-commercial purposes without the consent of the owner.
Thank you for your understanding and support!!!
name: Prelude to Nuss Jump

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Do you remember the story of the Wise Man from the East? In 2022, at the time of the end of the world, we successfully helped the sage from the East to create the "nuss jump". This is the story of the wise man from the East... This is also the story of all...
